alert.note: Alert for Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN NICHOLAS AND NORTHEASTERN HARRISON COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 708 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Cynthiana, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Carlisle, Oddville, Ellisville, Pleasant Valley, Headquarters, Claysville, Antioch, Myers, Barefoot and US Route 62 at State Route 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
